message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think you'd really appreciate it. I'm offering it to you for $115. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product and am willing to pay up to $100 for it. Could we possibly work towards that price?
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest! While $100 is definitely a fair price, I'm hoping to get a bit closer to $110 to make this work. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
Hello Alice, thank you for your follow-up. I'm still very interested in the product and would like to keep our negotiations going. I'm willing to pay $105 for it. Would that be possible?
